title: Episode 19 - Andy Kadin
itunes:title: Episode 19 - Andy Kadin
description: Andy Kadin is the passionate owner of Bub and Grandma's Bread, who provides the most amazing bread to the most amazing restaurants in the amazing city of Los Angeles. Andy and I first met on my Food Network show and have been pals ever since. Enjoy his amazing story.
